Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/87th
ShortDescription: NB 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vincennes, Kerfoot, 83rd & Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vincennes, Kerfoot, 83rd, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/87th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
